name: jselimore
description: JavaScript library that make ellipsis text for multiple line of text with view or more button.

scripts.build: cd assets/js && uglifyjs jselimore.js -c -m -o jselimore.min.js --source-map url=jselimore.min.js.map
scripts.dev: cd assets/js && uglifyjs jselimore.js -b -o jselimore.dev.js --source-map url=jselimore.dev.js.map

author: Petr Kovalenko
